meanings.definition: To classify or arrange into different categories.
meanings.sent1: She recategorizes her books by genre.
meanings.sent2: The librarian recategorizes the books on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The student recategorizes the classroom supplies for fun.
meanings.sent4: The chef recategorizes the ingredients like a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Recategorizing the items makes the task easier to manage.

meanings.definition: To reorganize or rearrange into new categories.
meanings.sent1: He recategorizes his closet by color.
meanings.sent2: The manager recategorizes the files for better organization.
meanings.sent3: The team recategorizes the project tasks for a change.
meanings.sent4: The artist recategorizes the colors in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: Recategorizing the data helps to see patterns more clearly.
